description.@en:
Although Elves are not able to see completely in the dark, they can see clearly in the dim light of stars. It’s evident that you’re an Elf when in these conditions, as your eyes tend to flash with their own light like an animal’s. This is the first sign of chaos made manifest in the Elven Ancestry. It is enough to drive dim-witted peasants to demand that “the demon be
hung by their neck until the lights go out”.

effect.@en: You can see completely in the dark above ground as if it were full daylight, provided there is starlight or moonlight in the sky.
